name: sciama-vscode
description: Select Slurm resources and connect VS Code Remote-SSH through a compute allocation.

sciamaSlurm.loginHosts.description: Login hosts available for connection. Used when loginHostsCommand is empty.

sciamaSlurm.loginHostsCommand.description: Remote command that outputs login hosts (newline or whitespace separated). If set, it is executed over SSH to discover login nodes.

sciamaSlurm.loginHostsQueryHost.description: Host used to run loginHostsCommand. Defaults to the first login host or the selected login host.

sciamaSlurm.partitionCommand.description: Remote command that outputs partition names.

sciamaSlurm.partitionInfoCommand.description: Remote command that outputs partition info in the format name|node|cpus|memMB|gres.

sciamaSlurm.qosCommand.description: Optional remote command that outputs QoS names.

sciamaSlurm.accountCommand.description: Optional remote command that outputs account names.

sciamaSlurm.user.description: SSH username. Leave blank to use the local OS username.

sciamaSlurm.identityFile.description: SSH identity file to include in generated host entries and used for resource queries.

sciamaSlurm.forwardAgent.description: Whether to set ForwardAgent yes in generated host entries.

sciamaSlurm.requestTTY.description: Whether to set RequestTTY yes in generated host entries.

sciamaSlurm.moduleLoad.description: Optional module load command prepended to the RemoteCommand.

sciamaSlurm.proxyCommand.description: Command that launches the Slurm proxy script on the remote host.

sciamaSlurm.proxyArgs.description: Extra arguments appended to the proxy command.

sciamaSlurm.extraSallocArgs.description: Extra salloc arguments appended to every request (e.g. --gres=gpu:1).

sciamaSlurm.promptForExtraSallocArgs.description: Prompt for additional salloc arguments each time you connect.

sciamaSlurm.defaultTime.description: Default wall time in HH:MM:SS or D-HH:MM:SS format.

sciamaSlurm.defaultMemoryMb.description: Default memory per node in MB. Set to 0 to leave unset.

sciamaSlurm.defaultGpuType.description: Default GPU type (e.g. A100). Leave blank for any type.

sciamaSlurm.defaultGpuCount.description: Default GPU count. Set to 0 to leave unset.

sciamaSlurm.sshHostPrefix.description: Prefix for generated SSH host aliases.

sciamaSlurm.openInNewWindow.description: Open the Remote-SSH connection in a new window.

sciamaSlurm.remoteWorkspacePath.description: Remote folder to open after connecting (e.g. /home/user/project). Leave blank to just connect.

sciamaSlurm.temporarySshConfigPath.description: Optional path for the temporary SSH config file. Leave blank to use the extension storage folder.

sciamaSlurm.restoreSshConfigAfterConnect.description: Restore Remote.SSH configFile after connecting when using a temporary SSH config.

sciamaSlurm.additionalSshOptions.description: Additional SSH config options to include in generated host entries.

sciamaSlurm.sshQueryConfigPath.description: Optional SSH config path to use when querying the cluster.

sciamaSlurm.sshConnectTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for SSH resource queries in seconds.
